name: sumo-logic
label: Sumo Logic
description: Sumo Logic provides best-in-class cloud monitoring, log management, Cloud SIEM tools, and real-time insights for web and SaaS based apps.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.description: URL of the Sumo Logic API server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: Access ID
fields.description: ID required to access the Sumo Logic API.
fields.name: access_id

fields.title: Access Key
fields.description: Key to access the Sumo Logic API.
fields.name: access_key

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.
fields.name: verify_ssl

operations.title: Create Search Job
operations.description: Creates a search job based on the specified query and time range in Sumo Logic.

parameters.title: Query
parameters.description:
Query using which you want to create and execute a seach job in Sumo Logic. 
Note: You must add this query in a valid JSON format.
parameters.name: query
parameters.tooltip: This query should be valid JSON format.

parameters.title: From
parameters.description: Start date and time from which you want to start the search in Sumo Logic. The date must be in the YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss format.
parameters.name: from
parameters.tooltip: Start date and time should be in YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss format.

parameters.title: To
parameters.description: End date and time till when you want to end the search in Sumo Logic. The date must be in the YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss format.
parameters.name: to
parameters.tooltip: End date and time should be in YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss format.

parameters.title: Time Zone
parameters.description: Select the timezone in which you want to start the search in Sumo Logic.
parameters.name: timeZone
parameters.tooltip: The time zone if from/to is not in milliseconds

operations.title: Get Search Job Status
operations.description: Retrieves the current status of a search job from Sumo Logic based on the search job ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Search Job ID
parameters.description: ID of the search job whose status you want to retrieve from Sumo Logic.
parameters.name: searchJobId

operations.title: Get Messages Founded by Search Job
operations.description: Retrieves messages found by a search job from Sumo Logic based on the search job ID, offset, and limit you have specified.

parameters.title: Search Job ID
parameters.name: searchJobId
parameters.description: ID of the search job whose messages you want to retrieve from Sumo Logic.

parameters.title: Offset
parameters.description: Index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful if you want to get a subset of records, say messages starting from the 10th message. By default, this is set as 0.
parameters.name: offset
parameters.tooltip: Returns the message first start at position 0.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of messages, per page, that this operation should return.
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: The number of messages starting at offset to return. Note: Valid range is 1 to 10000 messages or 100 MB in total message size.

operations.title: Get Records Founded by Search Job
operations.description: Retrieves records found by a search job from Sumo Logic based on the search job ID, offset, and limit you have specified.

parameters.title: Search Job ID
parameters.description: ID of the search job whose records you want to retrieve from Sumo Logic.
parameters.name: searchJobId

parameters.title: Offset
parameters.description: Index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful if you want to get a subset of records, say records starting from the 10th record. By default, this is set as 0.
parameters.name: offset
parameters.tooltip: Return records starting at this offset.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of messages, per page, that this operation should return.
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: The number of messages starting at offset to return. Note: Valid range is 1 to 10000 messages.

operations.title: Delete Search Job
operations.description: Deletes a search job from Sumo Logic based on the search job ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Search Job ID
parameters.name: searchJobId
parameters.description: ID of the search job that you want to delete from Sumo Logic.

operations.title: Get the List of All Insights
operations.description: Note: This API will not return more than 10,000 Signals for a given query, even when split over many pages. To retrieve all Signals, use the /signals/all API.

operations.title: Get Details By Insights ID
operations.description: Note: This API will not return more than 10,000 Signals for a given query, even when split over many pages. To retrieve all Signals, use the /signals/all API.

parameters.title: Insights ID
parameters.description: ID of the search insights that you want to retrieve from Sumo Logic.
parameters.name: insights_id
parameters.tooltip: Returns the message first start at position 0.
